[{"word_arabic":"ثُمَّ","word_ayah":18,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":73697,"word_number_in_surah":129,"word_translation":"Then","word_transliteration":"thumma"},{"word_arabic":"يُعِيدُكُمْ","word_ayah":18,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":73698,"word_number_in_surah":130,"word_translation":"He will return you","word_transliteration":"yu'idukum"},{"word_arabic":"فِيهَا","word_ayah":18,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":73699,"word_number_in_surah":131,"word_translation":"into it","word_transliteration":"fiha"},{"word_arabic":"وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ","word_ayah":18,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":73700,"word_number_in_surah":132,"word_translation":"and bring you forth","word_transliteration":"wayukh'rijukum"},{"word_arabic":"إِخْرَاجًا","word_ayah":18,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":73701,"word_number_in_surah":133,"word_translation":"(a new) bringing forth","word_transliteration":"ikh'rajan"}]
